name: part_004
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】SheenderellaDay ⧸ ラストに告知アリ！【#⁠星街すいせい6周年記念LIVE】 [i0vqoGF6xFo]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Hoshimachi Suisei continues her energetic performance of 'Outsider'.
An interlude with a ticking clock animation transitioning to the next stage.
Hoshimachi Suisei and Takagaki Kaede perform 'Koikaze (Short Ver.)' in a duet.
MC segment where Suisei and Kaede talk about their collaboration and express mutual respect.
Start of the performance of their new collaboration song 'Jubilee'.

subtitles.original: されたのは
subtitles.english: ...was done.

subtitles.original: 救われてたかな それでも僕は
subtitles.english: I wonder if I was saved? Even so, I...

subtitles.original: 今この身を以って
subtitles.english: Taking this body now,

subtitles.original: 面白を採って
subtitles.english: taking what's interesting,

subtitles.original: 君にでしかできない理なら
subtitles.english: if it's a truth only you can achieve,

subtitles.original: ここに鳴いていて
subtitles.english: then cry out here.

subtitles.original: 慰めなんていらないや
subtitles.english: I don't need any comfort.

subtitles.original: 果てになってしまうの様に
subtitles.english: As if coming to an end,

subtitles.original: その名を隠してここに現れたのさ
subtitles.english: I appeared here, hiding that name.

subtitles.original: 貪ってる奴らを
subtitles.english: Those who are devouring,

subtitles.original: 探って穿って 曝け出して
subtitles.english: probe them, dig deep, and expose them.

subtitles.original: その小さな勇気が 僕の胸を焦がすから
subtitles.english: Because that small bit of courage scorches my chest.

subtitles.original: こいかぜ (Short Ver.)
subtitles.english: Koikaze (Short Ver.)

subtitles.original: 渇いた風が 心 通り抜ける
subtitles.english: A dry wind passes through my heart,

subtitles.original: 溢れる思い 連れ去ってほしい
subtitles.english: I want it to take away these overflowing feelings.

subtitles.original: 二人の影 何気ない会話も
subtitles.english: Even our shadows and casual conversation,

subtitles.original: 嫉妬してる 切なくなる
subtitles.english: I'm jealous, it hurts...

subtitles.original: これが恋なの？
subtitles.english: Is this love?

subtitles.original: あなたしか見えなくなって
subtitles.english: I can only see you,

subtitles.original: 想い育ててゆくばかり
subtitles.english: and my feelings just keep growing.

subtitles.original: 苦しくて
subtitles.english: It's so painful,

subtitles.original: 見せかけの笑顔も もう作れないなんて
subtitles.english: that I can't even make a fake smile anymore.

subtitles.original: 満ちては欠ける想いが今 愛しくて溢れ出すの
subtitles.english: Feelings that wax and wane are now so dear they're overflowing.

subtitles.original: 舞い戻る風の踊る中で
subtitles.english: In the dancing wind that swirls back,

subtitles.original: めぐり逢えたこの奇跡が
subtitles.english: this miracle of our meeting,

subtitles.original: 遥かな大地を越えて
subtitles.english: crosses the distant earth.

subtitles.original: あなたと未来へ 歩きたいの
subtitles.english: I want to walk towards the future with you.

subtitles.original: 君だけを想う気持ち
subtitles.english: How I feel only about you,

subtitles.original: 伝えられる勇気が 私にあれば
subtitles.english: if I only had the courage to tell you...

subtitles.original: 切ない夜に さよならできる
subtitles.english: I could say goodbye to these painful nights.

subtitles.original: 願いをこめて Wish my love
subtitles.english: With a prayer, Wish my love,

subtitles.original: 踏み出す力ください
subtitles.english: please give me the strength to take a step forward.

subtitles.original: 楓さん、今日は来てくれてありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Kaede-san, thank you so much for coming today!

subtitles.original: お招きいただきありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: Thank you for having me.

subtitles.original: シンデレラガールズの高垣楓です。
subtitles.english: I'm Kaede Takagaki from Cinderella Girls.

subtitles.original: すいせいさん、
subtitles.english: Suisei-san,

subtitles.original: デビュー6周年、そしてお誕生日おめでとうございます。
subtitles.english: congratulations on your 6th anniversary and birthday.

subtitles.original: 楓さんと「こいかぜ」一緒に歌えて本当に嬉しいです！
subtitles.english: I'm so happy to be able to sing 'Koikaze' with you, Kaede-san!

subtitles.original: 私もすいせいさんとご一緒できてすごく嬉しかったです。
subtitles.english: I was also very happy to be with you, Suisei-san.

subtitles.original: とっても素敵な歌声で。
subtitles.english: You have such a wonderful singing voice.

subtitles.original: え～、ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Aww, thank you so much!

subtitles.original: 楓さんのことずっと応援していて大好きだったので、
subtitles.english: I've been a fan and have loved Kaede-san for a long time,

subtitles.original: 今回のコラボができたことが夢みたいです。
subtitles.english: so being able to do this collaboration feels like a dream.

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: Thank you.

subtitles.original: こんなお祝いの場に呼んでいただけて、こちらこそ光栄ですよ。
subtitles.english: It's my honor to be invited to such a celebratory occasion.

subtitles.original: 今回このコラボが実現したのは、私たちのコラボ曲もあるからなんですよね。
subtitles.english: The reason this collaboration happened is that we also have a collab song together, right?

subtitles.original: ええ。
subtitles.english: Yes.

subtitles.original: お互いの良さが現れた、とっても素敵な楽曲になりましたね。
subtitles.english: It turned out to be a wonderful song that brings out the best in both of us.

subtitles.original: 皆さんもぜひ楽しんでください。
subtitles.english: Everyone, please look forward to it and enjoy.

subtitles.original: それでは聴いてください。せーの…
subtitles.english: Then, please listen. Ready...

subtitles.original: ジュビリー！
subtitles.english: Jubilee!

subtitles.original: ジュビリー！
subtitles.english: Jubilee!

subtitles.original: 始まるよ ジュビリー
subtitles.english: It's beginning, Jubilee.
